title: Web Design
details: Learn the fundamentals of web design, including layout, color theory, and typography.

title: UI-UX-Design
details: Master the principles of user interface and user experience design to create engaging digital products.

title: Shopify
details: Learn how to set up, customize, and manage Shopify stores for effective online selling.

title: Web Development
details: Get hands-on experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks to build modern websites.
